title: Infernal Mace
content:
Infernal Mace Rare 6~11 Damage 1d6+2Bludgeoning+3Poison Infernal Weapon: On a hit, the affected entity deals an additional 3 Poison damage and can possibly Poison its target. Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Precise infernal runes are woven into this weapon's filigree, implying a creator well-versed in hellish arcana. Mace 1.8 190

1d6+2Bludgeoning+3Poison
